Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory192.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant? I didn't expect to see you here. Why are you here anyway?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'The question is ours to ask.', 4: '2'}
{3: "I knew there were two teams, but I didn't expect to meet them so early outside the Demon General's Castle."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I can answer you first. We came here because our clues showed that Liv once visited this place.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Wasn't Liv taken by the Demon King?", 3: '8', 4: 'Is Liv inside this castle?', 5: '9'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The Demon King... What's going on?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We aren't sure either, but she's definitely been around here.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Lucia's answer sounded slightly off, as if they were playing a different game."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "Looks like the information we collected didn't match for some reason... Kamui, did you not go to the castle?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "No, we didn't. Liv was lost before we started the game, so we've been looking for her.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Just like I thought...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'You must have been to the King\'s palace. We heard many rumors on the way, like "the King\'s minions"", and ""evil heroes."', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey, I'm not evil! It's Vera!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Me neither...', 3: '1001', 4: "She's actually not that bad.", 5: '1003'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Of course, I know Commandant wouldn't do that.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Wow, are you speaking for me, Commandant of Gray Raven? Thanks.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant, what exactly did the King tell you? Could you share it with us?', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Tell him what you know)', 3: '19'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I see. So the King NPC looked like Hassen, and he called Liv the Princess. She was taken by the Demon King to his castle.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The Goddess' artifact, and what the Demon General said before he was defeated... They all match what we know.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "So that King is a bad guy, isn't he?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Those humans who attacked the Demons out of revenge weren't any better.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "But from what Commandant said, the King wanted the heroes to collect the artifact for him to open the path to the Demon King's Castle.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "What could Liv's role possibly be...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "True... But he definitely needs Liv for something else, otherwise he wouldn't be putting her in the quest.", 4: '2'}
{3: "After Lee and Lucia's analysis, we were able to confirm two key things in the King's plan."}
{3: "The first was to open the gate of the Demon King's Castle, and the second was Liv."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We only need to collect the artifact to open the Demon King's Castle. But we don't know anything about Liv's situation yet, so we better take caution.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Why take caution? Just follow the quest tips.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But the King could have an evil plan up his sleeve. If we don't stop him, both the humans and Demons could suffer greatly.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "So what? This is just a game. I couldn't care less about their lives.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You may be right, Vera. But I will not give up anyone.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You have become even more disgusting after the memory loss.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "After the quarrel, Vera pulls her weapon out from the ground and walks directly toward the Demon General's Castle, followed by Camu and Karenina."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, if you are going into the castle, could you protect Liv if you happen to see her inside?', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Of course.', 3: '37', 4: 'What about you?', 5: '38'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The info we collected didn't show Liv entering the building, so we will continue searching around here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hurry up, Gray Raven! Don't forget you are in our team!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina grabbed me and pulled me into the castle.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Lucia, why did you let them take Commandant? We should keep as much strength as we can.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Because the enemy wanted us, not the other team of heroes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Oh, this part of you has never changed... Kamui, let's prepare for battle.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Understood!', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Lucia unsheathed her blade right after Commandant left. Kamui and Lee also braced themselves as a man walked out of a hidden corner.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Hah... You found me, heroes from afar.', 4: '1'}
